ğŸ’¾ **Improved XML Import**
Keeps your current data if the data IDs are different, preventing accidental overwrites.

ğŸ” **Search Bar in Rules Reference**
Added a Search Bar in the Rules Reference page for quick access to rules.

â€¢ Fixed a bug when saving the state of a character from a Campaign (ALERT - This fix will only work if you re-add your PC characters in your campaign and campaign encounters)
â€¢ Fixed a bug when importing a partial file (only items for example) using the Import All Data button
